_sdd.description: Structured intake template for external deal updates (e.g., Maurice weekly update)

intake_template.description: Lightweight intake template for deal pipeline updates. External contacts (Maurice, brokers, counsel) can use this format for structured updates. Ted also accepts freeform email as fallback.

deal_name.description: Name of the deal being updated

key_update.description: One-paragraph summary of what changed this week

next_actions.description: List of next steps with owner names

intake_template.email_format_example:
Subject: [DEAL UPDATE] Sunrise SNF Portfolio

Deal: Sunrise SNF Portfolio
Stage: due_diligence
Update: Received Phase I environmental reports for 3 of 5 facilities. Awaiting reports on remaining 2 (expected by 3/1). Census data shows 87% average occupancy across portfolio.

Next Actions:
- Clint: Review environmental reports by 2/28
- Maurice: Follow up on remaining 2 Phase I reports
- Isaac: Update financial model with census data

Blockers:
- Seller counsel slow to respond on indemnification language

Key Dates:
- 2026-03-01: Phase I reports due (remaining 2)
- 2026-03-15: LOI expiration
intake_template.fallback_behavior: If email does not match this template, Ted auto-triages via LLM classification (runInboxIngestionCycle). Structured format preferred but not required.
